conbody.p: Follow the procedures at PGI 222.1008-1 regarding use of the Service Contract Act Directory of Occupations when preparing the e98.

Use the clause 52.222-99, Establishing a Minimum Wage for Contractors (DEVIATION 2014-O0017)(JUN 2014) in solicitations and contracts that include the FAR clause 52.222-6 and/or 52.222-41, and work is to be performed in whole or in part in the United States (the 50 States and the District of Columbia). To the maximum extent practicable, insert clause 52.222-99 in solicitations issued on or after the date of the Executive Order, February 12, 2014, and before the date of this deviation, June 26, 2014, if the solicitation is otherwise being amended.
